title: Did the former "senior scientist " in Pfizer say that there is no need for vaccines?
subtitle: Michael Yedon was working at Pfizer a decade ago, and he was never the head scientist of the company. His argument against the vaccine depends on predictions that never worked.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Michael Yedon, who wrote that "There is absolutely no need for vaccines to quell the epidemic," was once the chief scientific officer in Pfizer.
